publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3171 Bill Butler: A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood—That the Parliament congratulates St Ninian’s Primary School in Knightswood, Glasgow, for its recent HM Inspectorate of Education follow-through report; notes that the report highlights children’s successes in gaining national awards, the constructive impact of the leadership of the head teacher and school management team on children’s experiences, positive relationships between staff and children, the commitment of staff in respect of improving the work of the school and the school’s approach to meeting the needs of children who require additional support in their learning; commends the head teacher, school management team, staff, parents and pupils for their achievements detailed in the report, and wishes the school continued success in the years to come.

S3M-3171 A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood (lodged on 6 January 2009) George Foulkes*, Bashir Ahmad*, Cathy Jamieson*, Stuart McMillan*, James Kelly*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Jack McConnell*, Jim Tolson*, Robert Brown*, Patricia Ferguson*, Cathy Peattie*, Des McNulty*, Angela Constance*
S3M-3171 A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood (lodged on 6 January 2009) Trish Godman*, Charlie Gordon*

S3M-3171 Bill Butler: A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood—That the Parliament congratulates St Ninian’s Primary School in Knightswood, Glasgow, for its recent HM Inspectorate of Education follow-through report; notes that the report highlights children’s successes in gaining national awards, the constructive impact of the leadership of the head teacher and school management team on children’s experiences, positive relationships between staff and children, the commitment of staff in respect of improving the work of the school and the school’s approach to meeting the needs of children who require additional support in their learning; commends the head teacher, school management team, staff, parents and pupils for their achievements detailed in the report, and wishes the school continued success in the years to come. Supported by: George Foulkes, Bashir Ahmad, Cathy Jamieson, Stuart McMillan, James Kelly, Jamie McGrigor, Bill Kidd, Jackie Baillie, Jack McConnell, Jim Tolson, Robert Brown, Patricia Ferguson, Cathy Peattie, Des McNulty, Angela Constance, Trish Godman, Charlie Gordon, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3171 A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood (lodged on 6 January 2009) Tom McCabe*
S3M-3171 A Gold Star for St Ninian’s Primary School, Knightswood (lodged on 6 January 2009) Karen Whitefield*
